definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun, typically used as a given name or surname, originating from English-speaking countries. It is derived from the patronymic form meaning 'son of Ben', where 'Ben' is a short form of Benjamin.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个专有名词，通常用作人名或姓氏，起源于英语国家，源自父名形式，意为‘本之子’，其中‘本’是‘本杰明’（Benjamin）的缩写。
definitions.example_en: Benson was the lead architect on the new city hall project.
definitions.example_cn: 本森是新市政厅项目的主要建筑师。
